comment:
* Class that describes the various metrics for a font at a given text size.
     * Remember, Y values increase going down, so those values will be positive,
     * and values that measure distances going up will be negative. This class
     * is returned by getFontMetrics().

variables.name: top
variables.comment:
* The maximum distance above the baseline for the tallest glyph in
         * the font at a given text size.

variables.name: ascent
variables.comment: * The recommended distance above the baseline for singled spaced text.

variables.name: descent
variables.comment: * The recommended distance below the baseline for singled spaced text.

variables.name: bottom
variables.comment:
* The maximum distance below the baseline for the lowest glyph in
         * the font at a given text size.

variables.name: leading
variables.comment: * The recommended additional space to add between lines of text.
